Package gr.aueb.cf.OOProjects.bankapp.model

Class OverdraftAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • gr.aueb.cf.OOProjects.bankapp.model.OverdraftAccount
  • public class OverdraftAccount
extends java.lang.Object
    A JavaBean class with public API. The OverdraftAccount class represents a joint bank account JointAccount that allows withdrawal of amounts greater than the balance of the account.

    • Constructor Summary
